          <title>
            <string language="sl">Tehniški dan - orientacija</string>
            <string language="en">Technical day - orientation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technischer Tag - Lagebestimmung</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Uporabno kot UL pri tehniškem dnevu. Učbenika, ki ju uporabljamo sta: NIT: \"Od mravlje do sonca\" (Modrijan), Družba: \"Družba in jaz\" (Modrijan).</string>
            <string language="en">Material for organizing technical day in school - building your own compass.</string>
          </description>

Tages in der Schule - Aufbauen Ihres eigenen Kompassses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Matériel pour organiser le jour technique à 
l'école - établir votre propre boussole.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Material para organizar o dia técnico na escola 
- construindo seu próprio compasso.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Materiale per l'organizzazione del giorno tecnico

σχολείο - που χτίζει την πυξίδα σας.</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Material para ordenar el día técnico en escuela
- construcción de su propio compás.</string>
          </description>
